page.title: 13LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Denbigh has the following major sports clubs:_{Rugby,soccer,ladies hockey, {cricket,golf,swimming,tennis and crown {green bowling.}All have their own grounds,the last three using the municapal facilities.Badminton and squash are catered for at the{Howell's {School sports hall. Denbigh has no municapal sports hall,many people travel to use {St.Asaph sports centre.}Organised activities for youngsters include {Brownies(girls),Cubs(boys),Guides}and {Scouts,Army Cadets}and the{A.T.C.}Most sports clubs have a junior section.The Youth Club has new facilities at Middle Lane.O.A.P.'s use the{Eirianfa {Day Centre}and are provided with concerts, lectures and a{Darby and {Joan Club.}Each public house has a pool,darts and domino team.There is a theatre and cinema in the town.
